column4: i am going to dual boot ubuntu and XP what is the best partition type to use that will work in both OS's.
NTFS is well-supported, fat32 is better-supported but has issues with hard shutdowns and system corruption.
What would you recommend NTFS or Fat32?  Fat32 has a 4GB file size limit.
if you must have Windows support, NTFS is probably the way to go... it's well-supported now under Ubuntu, and fat32 has too many liminations
